description:
ARC Raiders is a multiplayer extraction adventure set in a distant future earth. Here’s a first close look at gameplay, captured during our tech test last month. We follow a squad of three Raiders as they venture above ground on a quest in the Buried City. 

ARC Raiders releases in 2025 on PC via Steam and Epic Games Store, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and on cloud streaming through Nvidia GeForce Now.
title: ARC Raiders | Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer

description: After 14 long years, Red Dead Redemption has finally made its way to PC. Jake breaks down some of the biggest additions and whether or not this version is worth your time.
title: A Solid PC Port Shows How Red Dead Still Holds Up in 2024

description:
Fight your way through 100 Tiers of rewards in the newly designed Season 01 Battle Pass ☢️

The more rewards you claim, the more pages of content you unlock. What are you grinding for first? 🔥
title: COD Warzone & Black Ops 6 - Season 01 Battle Pass Overview Trailer

description:
🌙 He was given a second chance at life, becoming the avatar of the Egyptian Moon God, Khonshu. Piercing through the darkness, Moon Knight is ready to glide into the action in Marvel Rivals!  

Summoning sacred ankhs that connect him to Khonshu, Marc Spector unleashes Crescent Darts that bounce between foes and a powerful Moon Blade to finish them off. He’s ready to take down his enemies, and won’t stop until he claims victory in his master’s name.  

Marvel Rivals is officially launching on December 6, 2024! Get ready to ignite the battle with Moon Knight!
title: Marvel Rivals - Moon Knight Character Gameplay Reveal Trailer | "Fist of Khonshu"

description:
In this DLC, the character “Emil’s Shop” (CV: Maii Kadowaki) from the action RPG NieR:Automata™, produced by Square Enix and directed by Yoko Taro, appears with his item shop in the world of Stellar Blade™.

Available November 20, 2024 only on PS5® console. Purchase and game progression required to unlock.
title: Stellar Blade - NieR:Automata DLC Trailer

description:
We’re turning back the clock for some classic Overwatch fun!

Return to the thrilling gameplay experience that started it all in Overwatch: Classic.

Play with the original hero roster, their classic abilities, and enjoy the chaotic fun of 6v6.

Journey back to iconic maps like Hanamura, Temple of Anubis, Volskaya Industries, and more.

Group up with friends, old and new, as you experience the fun and camaraderie of early Overwatch.

Join the action when Overwatch: Classic arrives for a limited-time on Nov 12.

Overwatch 2 is free to play for everyone on console & PC!
title: Overwatch 2 - Overwatch: Classic | Official Limited Time Mode Trailer

description:
Raven's gone dark. Could be interference, or worse. Stick to the plan, Rogues. Be ready for the signal.

Rogue Point is an upcoming four player cooperative shooter, developed by the creators of Black Mesa - Crowbar Collective - and published by Team17.

Team up with friends and build an elite tactical team. Plan and execute challenging missions in a dynamic Rogue-Lite structure with hundreds of ways to play.
title: Rogue Point | Official Announcement Gameplay Trailer

description:
Jinx joins 2XKO in 2025. Sign up for a chance to playtest her.

2XKO is the free-to-play 2v2 fighting game featuring champions from League of Legends and Arcane. Register now for a chance to playtest Jinx, Ekko, and more in 2025.
title: 2XKO - Official Jinx Gameplay Reveal Trailer

description:
Adventure Calls. Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is coming to Xbox Series X|S, Game Pass, and PC on December 9. 

From locations and puzzles to gear and combat, MachineGames Audio Director, Pete Ward, takes us on a whirlwind journey through the world of The Great Circle. Get ready for launch with this look at Indy’s grand adventure.
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle - 14 Minute Gameplay Deep Dive
